kw.name: Set Appium Timeout
kw.doc: Sets the timeout in seconds used by various keywords.

kw.name: Open Application
kw.doc: Opens a new application to given Appium server. Capabilities of appium server, Android and iOS, Please check https://github.com/appium/appium/blob/master/docs/en/writing-running-appium/server-args.md | *Option* | *Man.* | *Description* | | remote_url | Yes | Appium server url | | alias | no | alias |

kw.name: Name
kw.doc: :example 'John Doe'

kw.name: Date
kw.doc: Get a date string between January 1, 1970 and now :param pattern format :example '2008-11-27'

kw.name: City
kw.doc: :example 'Sashabury'

kw.name: Postcode
kw.doc: Randomly returns a postcode. :param formatted: True to allow formatted postcodes, else False (default True) :example formatted: '41224-212' '83992-291' '12324322' :example raw: '43920231' '34239530'

Capabilities of appium server, Android and iOS, Please check https://github.com/appium/appium/blob/master/docs/en/writing-running-appium/server-args.md | *Option* | *Man.* | *Description* | | remote_url | Yes | Appium server url | | alias | no | alias |
